short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows to quickly access Salesforce metadata.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Press Cmd + Shift + s to access sObject metadata with Salesforce Terminal. This extension provides developers and admins with a streamlined interface for viewing fields and object metadata, making it easier to develop, debug, and deploy your Salesforce applications.
